proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file tests/execution_queue.test.js with this complete content:

const request = require('supertest'); // or any preferred HTTP library for NodeJS applications to test API endpoints...
// ... write unit tests here using Jest, Mocha, or similar testing frameworks that ensure each endpoint behaves as expected when handling requests and responses correctly (status codes, data payloads) by calling the execution_queue/index.js route handler directly with various scenarios like adding tasks to queue, fetching pending tasks...

This is for opportunity: E-commerce AI Personalization
Make sure the file is complete, working, and production-ready.
risks: Slow failure: unnoticed degradation accumulating by 2027-12-31
Unintended consequence: incentives shift toward short-term metrics, long-term reliability decays
Incentive drift: stakeholders habituate to optimistic outputs, raising risk of silent defects
mitigations: Add scheduled adversarial audits with hard pass/fail gates
Track leading indicators for drift and trust inflation; alert on trend change
Prefer reversible rollouts; keep rollback artifacts warm and tested
